'''You've Got to Have Reserves''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect four extra [[Plump Fish]] at the end of ''[[Starting From Zero#Open Resources, Thrifty Expenditure|Open Resources, Thrifty Expenditure]].''
